  "bounds": [800, 600],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "position": [50, 50],
          "bounds": [300, 300],
          "drawsContent": true,
          "children": [
            {
              "bounds": [300, 300],
              "children": [
                {
                  "bounds": [285, 300],
                  "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "bounds": [285, 1000]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
